alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 9:28PM AKST until February 18 at 7:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THURSDAY TO 7 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Susitna Valley. * WHEN...From 7 AM Thursday to 7 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will overspread the Susitna Valley from southwest to northeast through early Thursday morning. Snow may be heavy at times late Thursday morning through late Thursday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
